favourite.article: Amen Lord Jesus, Thank You for Your word.... "My child the work is done" You will work in wondrous power, Far beyond my highest thought. Lord Jesus I Love You.

This song inspires me because of the truth it contains! It is "His incomparably great power for us who believe. That power is like the working of His mighty strength, which He exerted in Christ when He raised Him from the dead"!!! (Eph.1:19)
